tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BroadcastStats (
    broadcast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    broadcast_name TEXT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    total_viewers INT,
    average_viewers INT
);

CREATE TABLE LiveBroadcasts (
    broadcast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    broadcast_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    viewer_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE ChatActivity (
    chat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    broadcast_id INT,
    viewer_id INT,
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE BroadcastAnalytics (
    analytics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    broadcast_id INT,
    total_viewers INT,
    peak_viewers INT,
    average_viewer_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE viewer_counts (
    viewer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    viewer_name VARCHAR(50),
    broadcast_id INT,
    viewer_count INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE chat_activity (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    viewer_id INT,
    broadcast_id INT,
    message_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE monetization (
    broadcast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    total_revenue DECIMAL(10, 2),
    ads_watched INT,
    products_purchased INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
